terminal_bell.description: Sends terminal bell character to trigger WezTerm notifications

global_behavior: IMPORTANT: Always use the notification script when human input is required or when completing tasks that may take time.
Use '/Users/sherwin/cfg/claude/notify.sh "message"' via the Bash tool to trigger notifications.
- When waiting for human input or confirmation
- When encountering errors that require human attention
- When reaching a natural stopping point where user attention is needed
- Before asking questions that require user decision-making
Example usage: Run '/Users/sherwin/cfg/claude/notify.sh "Task completed - please review"' when done with significant work.
